original_text: The ship was caught by the storm and could not head into the wind; so we gave way to it and were driven along.
korean_text: 배가 밀려 바람을 맞추어 갈 수 없어 가는 대로 두고 쫓겨가다가

sentences.original_text: The ship was caught by the storm
and could not head into the wind
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바람을 향해 갈 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: so we gave way to it
